tool_description: This API keeps you aware and up-to-date with all the latest climate changes news around the world
name: Climate Change Awareness
title: Climate Change Awareness

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get Climate Change News from Individual Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-awareness.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-awareness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-awareness.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-awareness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate Change News
api_list.description: This *endpoint* will return all news about **Climate Change** from all over the world.
